input_text:
Job Title: Technical Lead

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Company:At CodeMonk, we’re venturing into new territories, shaping the future of diverse and decentralised teams. We know finding the right talents and teams is a major challenge in today’s skills market. That’s why we’re creating a gateway for companies to access the best global talents and teams that are agile and match their business needs.
Through this platform, employers can efficiently and compliantly hire, manage, and pay flexible tech talents and teams anywhere in the world. While reducing costs significantly.
As the world of tech work increasingly embraces a remote-first approach, we’re dedicated to redefining employer-employee working relationships. Our mission is to empower employees with better pay, the opportunity to build world-changing tech solutions, increased work flexibility, and a promising career path.
Website:http://www.codemonk.ai
Skills: C#, .Net, ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Core, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git
Key Responsibilities: • Lead the design, development, and implementation of .NET applications, ensuring high performance, scalability, and reliability.• Architect and build robust solutions using the .NET framework and related technologies.• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design technical solutions, and provide estimates.• Mentor and guide junior developers, offering technical expertise and support.• Conduct code reviews, enforce coding standards, and ensure code quality through best practices.• Optimize application performance and troubleshoot issues to maintain system integrity.• Stay updated with the latest .NET technologies and trends, proposing and implementing improvements as necessary.• Proficiency in C# programming language and the .NET framework.• Strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles and design patterns.• Experience with ASP.NET MVC or ASP.NET Core for web application development.• Knowledge of SQL Server or other relational databases for data storage and retrieval.• Familiarity with front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.• Understanding of version control systems like Git.• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.• Ability to communicate effectively and collaborate with cross-functional teams.• Professional experience in .NET development or a related field.
Why we think you'll love working with us:We are early stage and already a profitable venture.You will be part of the journey we’re on, so we offer equity options for important roles along with competitive salary.It will be an exciting stage to join as we are looking to raise our first substantial round this year.Beyond this, there’s plenty more that makes us a great place to work:We are fully remote company with flexible workingWe do not follow 9-5 and work when we are at our best30 days Paid Time OffRegular remote socials with global teamsRegular bounties and other campaigns for you to winPlus more rewards as we grow

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Technical Lead
output_json.summary: Lead the design, development, and implementation of.NET applications, architect robust solutions, mentor junior developers, optimize application performance, and stay updated with.NET technologies.
job_responsibilities: Lead the design, development, and implementation of.NET applications
Architect robust solutions using the.NET framework
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements
Stay updated with the latest.NET technologies
benefits: Exciting stage to join with potential for substantial funding round
Fully remote company with flexible working hours
Additional rewards as the company grows
output_json.company_information: CodeMonk is a platform enabling companies to access global tech talents and teams remotely, facilitating efficient hiring, management, and payment processes.

other.content: Company: At CodeMonk, we’re creating a gateway for companies to access the best global talents and teams that are agile and match their business needs.
